timeline.message:
Improve presentation of plugin categories

- Show labels/categories in each plugin entry (supporting filtering)
- Don't have multiple table sections for categories

timeline.bodyText: I'd rename this class to .plugin-manager-category-label, as .category-label is too generic.
timeline.author: fqueiruga

replies.bodyText: This CSS is only loaded within the plugin manager (see file path). Still?
replies.author: daniel-beck

replies.bodyText: Then it's not that big of a deal. I still recommend trying to namespace CSS in case we kill / group adjuncts one day (which I really, really want to do)
replies.author: fqueiruga

timeline.bodyText: Some Javadoc would with explanation be nice
timeline.author: oleg-nenashev

timeline.bodyText:

timeline.author: oleg-nenashev
